item.title: I’d rather read 50 lines than Extract Method Refactoring
item.description: Extract Method refactoring is a great way to give names to concepts so code is easier to read and flows. But it can go wrong when you use it, creating a lot of indirection and unexpected behavior from the methods you extract.
